=====
Names
=====
.. module:: internationalflavor.names

This module contains some utilities for storing names. It is not a one-size-fits-all solution, as it is simply not
possible to capture all the world's name formats in a single module.

Utilities
---------
.. autofunction:: internationalflavor.names.utils.split_name
.. autofunction:: internationalflavor.names.utils.join_name
